name: Camp Neve Ice Axe
description: The classic, even elegant, design of this ice axe suits trekking and mountaineering and travel over glaciated terrain. A generous adze is curved and chops steps like a machine.Forged chromoly steel pick and adzeCurved adze has comfortable hand grip.Carabiner holes at head and spike.Spike is symmetrical for smooth, reliable plunging.Includes a sliding leash.
